title: Bug 3970 - UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files
description: The Windows workstations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse because they are cheaper than Unix boxes.
OB: When creating a new file, the line delimiter used is currently retrieved from System.getProperties("line.delimiter"). However, this may not always be what the user wants.
EB: The expected behavior is to provide a UI option for users to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse.
2. Create a new file.
3. Verify that there is a UI option available to define the default line delimiters for the new file.
4. Select different line delimiters and proceed with creating the file.
5. Verify that the selected line delimiters are used for the new file.
